item.text:
<textHeader>WHAT IS IT?</textHeader> <textBody>Marketing Asset Activation is best in class activation of our assets with communication that enhances our trademark in order to maximize our investment and drive business results.</textBody> <textHeader>OBJECTIVE</textHeader> <textBody>Maximize our investments with critical assets to enhance our trademark and leverage our association in a relevant and compelling way.
Drive opportunistic availability of our brands in priority channels and provide a distinct competitive advantage with our consumers.
Recruit youth via availability and connection.
Create personal, meaningful connections between consumers, our brands and their Sports/Entertainment passions that are unique and special.</textBody>

WHAT IS IT? Trademark enhancement is best in class activation of our assets with sustaining communication that enhances our trademark in order to maximize our investment and drive business results. / In-Venue Zone Strategy / MAA Guiding Principles / MAA Implementation Tools / Customer Sales Aid OBJECTIVE Creative customized elements utilizing pre-approved templates facilitate asset activation in-venue ACTIVATION ZONES Zone 1 – Concession Zone 2 – Concourse/Stadium Zone 3 – Entrance/Parking Lot

<textHeader>BRAND GUIDELINES</textHeader> <textBody>Priority Sparkling: Coca-Cola <textNote>* These priorities should be followed when activating sustaining elements. All appropriate promotional brands should be used to support national program efforts.</textNote></textBody>

ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: The Howard Company / Website / Contact via Email to Order Weaver Media / Website / Contact via Email to Order For additional information on the suppliers, click the SUPPLIERS tab.

THE HOWARD COMPANY / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 6 main menu boards (sizes & types) and illuminated boards along with numerous specialty/custom boards for unique applications and locations. Variations include: with/without panel header, with/without acrylic cover, with digital LCD display
  • All menu boards use the same size strips and numbers although colors and font styles can be changed. Menu items and numbers are all separate
  • Magnets can be ordered online. All strips and numbers are direct printed on magnetic material
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as banners and adhesive graphics (floor and wall)
    •  WEAVER MEDIA / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 10 main menu boards including illuminated boards
  • All menu boards use magnetic strips (one strip that included menu items and prices)
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as adhesive graphics (floor and wall), concession stand graphics, banners

ORDERING It is the requestor's responsibility to ensure logos are partner approved. Obtain approved cups and/or templates as listed below:
  • PRIORITY #1 - Approved Red Coca-Cola Iconic Cups can be ordered via the Coke Catalog
  • PRIORITY #2 – Approved Compostable & Environmentally Sustainable Cups can be found at Spread the Red (* Search Key Words “Green cupware” - To be used ONLY in venues that have a composting program)
  • PRIORITY #3 - Approved Asset Specific Cup Templates can be ordered and customized via Finished Art. Contact Daphne Brown via email.
  • PRIORITY #4 – Approved artwork for Partner can be ordered through Finished Art. Contact Daphne Brown via email.
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Design Machine / Website
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Design Machine / Website
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Design Machine / Website
CREW UNIFORMS For brand-specific items: Spread the Red / Website
HAWKING TRAYS Refer to the Merchandising Idea Book or go to: Spread the Red / Website
ORDERING To Produce: IRP / Contact via Email
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website To Produce: Display Industries / Contact via Email
ORDERING To order Recycling Bins: Coke Bins / Website
